tool_description: Manages customer consent preferences for data processing, marketing communications, and privacy settings with legal compliance tracking.

consent_type.description: Type of consent: marketing, analytics, personalization, data_sharing, or cookies

consent_status.description: Whether consent is granted (true) or withdrawn (false)

consent_method.description: How consent was obtained: website_form, email_click, phone_call, in_person, or system_default

legal_basis.description: Legal basis for processing: consent, contract, legal_obligation, vital_interests, public_task, or legitimate_interests

expiry_date.description: When consent expires in ISO 8601 format

consent_details.description: Additional details about the consent context

error_messages: Customer not found: No profile exists for the provided customer_id.
Invalid consent_type: Use one of [marketing, analytics, personalization, data_sharing, cookies].
Invalid consent_method: Use one of [website_form, email_click, phone_call, in_person, system_default].
Invalid legal_basis: Use one of [consent, contract, legal_obligation, vital_interests, public_task, legitimate_interests].
Invalid expiry_date: Provide date in ISO 8601 format and ensure it's in the future.
Consent conflict: Cannot withdraw mandatory consent required for core service functionality.
usage: Provide customer_id, consent_type, consent_status, and consent_method to record consent decisions. The tool maintains legal compliance records and consent history.

consent_id.description: Unique identifier for this consent record

previous_consent_status.description: Previous consent status before this change
